Magical Walt Disney World® Vacations Await
Stay Near the Magic at The Grove Resort
Live out your childhood dreams or make new ones with your own kids in tow at the most magical place on earth: Walt Disney World
®
Theme Parks.
From its first opening in 1971,
Walt Disney World
®
Resort has committed to being a playground for all, which is why it’s still enchanting for adults and kids alike. Within Disney’s four parks, you can go for a thrill ride, snack on delicious park treats, or walk alongside your favorite characters from the silver screen. What’s not to love?

IF the module type is Experiences
Extend the Magic
Walt Disney World Good Neighbor® Hotel
We don't need to convince you of the magic of Walt Disney World
®
Theme Parks. But we can make your visit to the parks as seamless and satisfying as possible. As one of the top hotels near the magic, The Grove has earned its place as a Walt Disney World Good Neighbor
®
Hotel. What does that mean for you? We're here to make your dreams come true.

Contact us at The Grove
The Best Resort in Orlando, Florida
Located just six miles from Walt Disney World® Theme Parks, The Grove Resort & Water Park Orlando puts Orlando Florida’s world-famous parks, restaurants, and attractions at your fingertips.
We are ready to serve you. If you have a request or comment, or if you would like additional information about our hotel, the following is how to reach us, and individual departments related to your need.
Contact Us
Contact me by:
Phone
Email
First name*
Last name*
Email*
Phone number
Comment*
I consent to having this website store my submitted information so they can respond to my inquiry.
Submit
/.form__actions
Fancybox content
Ways to Get in Touch
We are ready to serve you. If you have a request or comment, or if you would like additional information about our hotel, the following is how to reach us, and individual departments related to your need.
14501 Grove Resort Ave., Winter Garden, FL 34787
Toll Free Reservations:
877-890-7932
Hotel Toll Free:
833-641-2147
Hotel:
407-545-7500
Fax:
321-319-6793
Email:
reservations@groveresortorlando.com
+
-
Discover the magic of Disney Springs, an immersive entertainment district at Walt Disney World Resort.
Visit Disney Springs's Website
LEGOLAND Florida features over 55 rides in their Florida theme park.
Visit LEGOLAND® Florida's Website
Gatorland is a 110-acre park with thousands of alligators, crocodiles, an aviary, and much more.
Visit Gatorland's Website
Universal Studios Orlando Theme Park offers multiple roller coasters and attractions such as the ET Adventures and The Simpsons Ride.
Visit Universal Studios Orlando's Website
Universal Volcano Bay is a tropical-themed water park with multiple water features and slides.
Visit Universal Volcano Bay's Website
Universal Epic Universe,  opening in May of 2025, features Universal’s Dark Universe as well as Super Nintendo World.
Visit Universal Epic Universe's Website
Universal Islands of Adventure features The Wizarding World of Harry Potter and favorites like Jurassic Park Land.
Visit Universal Islands of Adventure's Website
Seaworld is a marine life-themed amusement park featuring rides, animal exhibits, and demonstrations.
Visit Seaworld's Website
ICON Park Orlando features rides, games, and The Orlando Eye.
Orlando International Airport (MCO) is just a short drive from our resort, offering easy access to your vacation destination.
Visit Orlando International Airpot (MCO)'s Website
If you’re looking for the best family things to do in Orlando, The Surfari Water Park can't be missed!
Visit Splash at Surfari Water Park's Website
Flip Flop's Family Fun Center is 6,600 square feet of excitement and features a glow-in-the-dark indoor mini golf course! Enjoy cutting-edge video and redemption games and classics like Skee-Ball.
Visit Classic Arcade Games at Flip Flop's Family Center's Website
Offering sweeping views of the nature preserve that surrounds, Lake Austin is serene and beautiful, offering the ideal Orlando fishing spot & location to enjoy a variety of resort watersports.
Fairytale dreams come true for children of all ages at Magic Kingdom Park.
EPCOT® has always been an amazing place to celebrate the world and immerse ourselves in the wonder of attractions and events that excite the senses.
Visit EPCOT®'s Website
At Disney's Hollywood Studios, celebrate attractions and lands that make a day here even more extraordinary.
Visit Disney's Hollywood Studios®'s Website
Encounter the magic of nature with rare creatures, authentic adventures, and world-class entertainment at Disney's Animal Kingdom Park, one of the largest animal theme parks in the world.
Visit Disney's Animal Kingdom® Theme Park's Website
Disney's Blizzard Beach, just a short drive from our resort, is a winter-themed water park offering thrilling slides and fun attractions for all ages.
Visit Disney's Blizzard Beach's Website
Disney's Typhoon Lagoon is a thrilling water park just a short drive from our resort.
Visit Disney's Typhoon Lagoon's Website
Welcome to The Grove Resort & Water Park, where magic meets relaxation, and dreams come to life!

Reservations Department
Call our Reservations Toll Free Number
877-890-7932
for room reservations or
click here
to email us.
Cancellations
: Reservations must be cancelled at least 72 hours in advance of arrival by 4pm EST, or the first night’s stay (at quoted rate plus tax) will be charged.
To cancel a reservation
: If you booked directly on our website you can
Modify/Cancel Reservation
at the bottom of the page where you booked. You can also cancel through your confirmation email.
‍If you booked with an online travel agency or other third party, please contact the third party directly.
Meetings
Information on planning meetings, special events & conference support: Contact Group Sales by calling
407-734-0649
or email us.
Weddings
Our wedding planning department is ready to help: Contact our wedding professionals directly by calling
407-734-0609
or email us.
Social Events
Professional catering services for your next celebration: If you are planning a special celebration, party, or need our professional catering services team, contact us by calling
407-734-0609
or email us.
Private Cabana / Activity Center
To book a private cabana at The Springs Pool or Surfari Water Park, or access to our activity center
visit Resortpass
.
Dining
Alfresco Market
For any questions, call us at
407-545-7500
ext. 1553.
Valencia Restaurant
For any questions or to make a reservation, call us at
407-545-7500
ext. 1581.
Longboard Bar & Grill
For any questions, call us at
407-545-7500
ext. 1588.
The Springs Bar & Gril
The Springs Bar & Grill: For any questions, call us at
407-545-7500
ext. 1581.

The ultimate vacation experience awaits at The Grove
Excitement & Relaxation
Whether you want to continue the excitement of your Orlando vacation or find a peaceful retreat, The Grove Resort & Water Park Orlando provides the experience you desire for your vacation. Surfari Water Park offers excitement for all ages including our FlowRider® Double surf simulator! For serenity, adults can escape to The Springs Pools to take a quiet swim while enjoying poolside cocktails and relaxing. Those seeking a more natural experience can venture to Lake Austin for a variety of watersports, or simply to take in the charm of Central Florida's unique and diverse landscape in this wide-open space.

Discover Luxury Near Disney at Our Resort
Your Gateway to Orlando's Magic & Fun
Located just six miles from Walt Disney World® Theme Parks, The Grove Resort & Water Park Orlando puts Orlando’s world famous parks and attractions at your fingertips. Offering daily transportation to Walt Disney World® Theme Parks, Universal Orlando, and SeaWorld. Please visit our FAQ page for transportation hours.
Resort Fee
Our daily resort fee is $40 for Two Bedroom Suites plus tax, per suite, per
night, and $50 for Three Bedroom Suites plus tax, per suite, per night. This
includes:
Daily Transportation to and from Walt Disney World®, Universal
Orlando, and SeaWorld
Entrance to The Springs Pools
Resort Wide Wi-Fi
In-Suite Local and Toll-Free Calls
In-Suite Coffee and Tea Setup
Unlimited 24/7 Access to our Fitness Center
Use of the Business Center
swipper
.swiper-wrapper
swiper controls end
The Terraces
A Tranquil Environment to Relax While in Orlando
This up-scale, exclusive, adult-centric hotel, located on the campus of The Grove, will offer guests a tranquil and relaxing environment, set away from the crowds overlooking Lake Austin.
Learn more The Terraces
This up-scale, exclusive, adult-centric hotel, located on the campus of The Grove, will offer guests a tranquil and relaxing environment, set away from the crowds overlooking Lake Austin.
Learn more The Terraces
Resort Map
Explore the expansive grounds of The Grove Resort & Water Park using our convenient resort map, guiding you to all the exciting attractions and amenities.

Discover Luxury Near Disney at Our Resort
Your Gateway to Orlando's Magic & Fun
Located just six miles from Walt Disney World® Theme Parks, The Grove Resort & Water Park Orlando puts Orlando’s world famous parks and attractions at your fingertips. Offering daily transportation to Walt Disney World® Theme Parks, Universal Orlando, and SeaWorld. Please visit our FAQ page for transportation hours.
Resort Fee
Our daily resort fee is $40 for Two Bedroom Suites plus tax, per suite, per
night, and $50 for Three Bedroom Suites plus tax, per suite, per night. This
includes:
Daily Transportation to and from Walt Disney World®, Universal
Orlando, and SeaWorld
Entrance to The Springs Pools
Resort Wide Wi-Fi
In-Suite Local and Toll-Free Calls
In-Suite Coffee and Tea Setup
Unlimited 24/7 Access to our Fitness Center
Use of the Business Center

The Terraces
A Tranquil Environment to Relax While in Orlando
This up-scale, exclusive, adult-centric hotel, located on the campus of The Grove, will offer guests a tranquil and relaxing environment, set away from the crowds overlooking Lake Austin.

Weekend Breakfast Buffett at Valencia
IF the module is rooms
Special Events
Family Activities
Indulge in the delectable offerings our Valencia Chef and his team offer on our breakfast buffet. Join us at Valencia every Saturday and Sunday morning for a full breakfast buffet, including breakfast potatoes, sausage, bacon, scrambled eggs, french toast or pancakes, fruit, pastries and bagels, a charcuterie station, yogurt and cereal bar, and fresh juices. Watch our chefs make you your omelet to order at our made-to-order omelet bar. Open every weekend, from 8:00 a.m. until 12:00 p.m.
Adults: $28 plus tax per person
Children: 4-10 years old $14 plus tax per person
Children under the age of 4 eat for free with the purchase of an adult buffet.
